name: Terry Pants SUPER SALE PRICE !!!
description:
very cute terry pants.
hard wearing and gorgeous with elasticised waistband.
sewn with organic cotton thread - even the elastic is organic!
these are truly 100% organic pants!
great pants for all occasions - and don't worry about the dirt! from personal experience, i believe the weave and strength of the organic cotton make stains easier to wash out.
100% organic cotton - the softest and snuggliest cotton around.
the quality of the fabric is amazing.
made in australia.
See FAQs for sizing chart.
